      • itemScore

        public int itemScore(Player player)
        Calculates the score for all remaining items in the players inventory. All items are worth 75% of their original value. Each $1 is worth 10 points.
        Parameters:
        player - The player thats items are getting scored.
        Returns:
        The score for all remaining items in the players inventory.

      • petScore

        public int petScore(Pet pet)
        Calculates a end-game score for a pet. Higher scores mean the pet was taken care of better. The score for a pet is calculated to be 100 * its happiness + health.
        Parameters:
        pet - The pet that is getting a score taken from.
        Returns:
        The score of the pet.

      • readAbout

      • readScoring

        public java.lang.String readScoring()
        Reads the scoring game file using a BufferedReader.
        Returns:
        String of the scoring information file.
